captions.text: The competition is really tough and it's getting tougher every day.
The car is crafted by our team - Drift Tigers - it has a stock engine, 3000 cubic, with GT40 turbine,
580 horse power, professionally prepared for drifting, as I said -- by our team.
I'm really looking forward to competing with professional drifters from abroad at the finals in Dubai and I'm hoping to get a good result!

title: Drift Racing in Bulgaria - Red Bull Car Park Drift 2013
